overview:
Himanshu is responsible for the technical development and implementation of Gotootie’s products and infrastructure. His research interests are in location based services, mobile data management, green IT and vehicular technology. Prior to founding Gotootie, Himanshu worked in the technology industry in various software engineering roles.

Himanshu holds a Masters degree in computer science from the University of Southern California and Bachelors in Computer Science and Engineering from University of Mumbai. He also holds a teaching certificate from University of Central Florida and his research has been published in various internal conferences. He is an active member Upsilon Pi Epsilon computer science honors society, ACM, and IEEE.
